TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSecureResolver extends System.Xml.XmlResolver

summary.span: 通过包装 对象和限制基础 有权访问的资源，帮助保护 的另一个实现。

span.span: Helps to secure another implementation of by wrapping the object and restricting the resources that the underlying has access to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 命名空间中所有类的默认解析器。The class is the default resolver for all classes in the namespace. 它用于加载 XML 文档和解析外部资源，例如实体、Dtd 或架构以及导入或包含指令。It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives. 可以通过指定要使用的对象来重写此默认值 。You can override this default by specifying the object to use. 例如，如果要限制基础 可以访问的资源，则可以使用 对象。For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying can access, you can use an object. 环绕的具体实现 ，并限制基础 有权访问的资源。 wraps around a concrete implementation of and restricts the resources that the underlying has access to. 例如， 能够禁止跨域重定向，这种重定向是通过嵌入的统一资源标识符 (URI) 引用发生的。For example, has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference. 构造 对象时，请提供有效 的实现以及 URL、证据对象的实例或权限集，使用此实现 来确定安全性。When you construct an object, you provide a valid implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the to determine security. 生成一个， 或使用现有的并 在其上调用来帮助保护基础 。Either a is generated or the existing one is used and is called on it to help secure the underlying . > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象可以包含敏感信息，例如用户凭据。 objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 在缓存对象时应谨慎 ，并且不应将 对象传递给不受信任的组件。You should be careful when caching objects and should not pass the object to an untrusted component. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 .NET Framework 公共语言运行时上运行的代码的不同之处在于 (CLR) ，以及在 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 中集成的 CLR 上运行的代码。There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005. 这可能会导致为 .NET Framework CLR 开发的代码在 SQL Server 集成 CLR 上使用时的操作方式有所不同。This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR. 当你在 使用 方法或构造函数) 时，当你具有基于 URL 的证据时，其中一种差异会影响类 ( 。One of these differences affects the class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the method or the constructor). SQL Server 集成 CLR 的策略解析机制不使用 或 信息。The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the or information. 相反，它会根据加载程序集时服务器添加的 GUID 来授予权限。Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded. 在 SQL Server 集成 CLR 中使用时，请使用指定的直接提供任何所需的证据 。When you use the in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified . ## 使用安全解析程序To use a secure resolver 1. 使用正确的权限集创建 对象。Create an with the correct permission set. 2. 创建使用 对象的 对象。Create an object that uses the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#5a)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#5a)] 3. 当你创建对象时，将对象传递给方法 。Pass the object to the method when you're creating the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#5b)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#5b)] ## 使用 URL 限制访问To restrict access by using a URL 使用 构造函数创建 只允许访问本地 intranet 站点的对象。Use the constructor to create an object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#3)] ## 使用权限集限制访问To restrict access by using a permission set 1. 创建 对象。Create a object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4a)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4a)] 2. 指定要允许访问的 Url。Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4b)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4b)] 3. 将 Web 权限添加到 对象中。Add the web permissions to the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4c)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4c)] 4. 使用 构造函数 通过权限集创建对象。Use the constructor to create an object by using the permission set. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4d)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4d)] 若要查看其他示例，请参阅 引用页。See the reference page for another example. ## 使用证据限制访问To restrict access by using evidence 可以使用 构造函数并指定来限制访问 。You can restrict access by using the constructor and specifying . 用于创建应用于基础 的 。The is used to create the that is applied to the underlying . 在打开任何资源之前， 在已创建的 上调用 。The calls on the created before opening any resources. 下面是一些常见方案以及为每种方案提供的证据类型：Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - 如果在完全信任的环境中工作，请使用程序集来创建证据：If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#1)] - 如果你在不完全受信任的环境中工作，你将拥有来自外部源的代码或数据，并且知道外部源的来源并且具有可验证的 URI，请使用 URI 创建证据：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#2)] - 如果你在不完全受信任的环境中工作，并且你的代码或数据来自外部源，但不知道外部源的来源，则可以：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: 将 `evidence` 参数设置为 `null`。Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`. 这样将不允许对资源进行任何访问。This allows no access to resources. - 或 --or- 如果应用程序要求对资源进行一些访问，应向调用方请求数据。If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller. ## 使用安全解析程序加载 XSLT 样式表To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1. 使用正确的权限集创建 对象。Create an with the correct permission set. 2. 将 传递到 方法。Pass the to the method. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#6)]

span.span: This class has an inheritance demand.

para.span: 从类继承需要完全信任 。

span.span: Full trust is required to inherit from the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这三个构造函数提供了三种类型的访问限制：The three constructors provide three types of access restrictions: - 构造函数通过使用 URL 来限制访问。The constructor restricts access by using a URL. - 构造函数使用权限集限制访问。The constructor restricts access by using a permission set. - 构造函数通过使用证据来限制访问。The constructor restricts access by using evidence. 有关这些类型的限制的示例，请参阅构造函数参考主题。See the constructor reference topics for examples of these types of restrictions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是一些可能的方案以及要为每个方案提供的证据类型：Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - 如果在完全信任的环境中工作，请使用程序集来创建证据：If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#1)] - 如果你在不完全受信任的环境中工作，你将拥有来自外部源的代码或数据，并且知道外部源的来源并且具有可验证的 URI，请使用 URI 创建证据：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#2)] - 如果你在不完全受信任的环境中工作，并且你的代码或数据来自外部源，但不知道外部源的来源，则可以：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: 将 `evidence` 参数设置为 `null`。Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`. 这样将不允许对资源进行任何访问。This allows no access to resources. - 或 --or- 如果应用程序要求对资源进行一些访问，应向调用方请求数据。If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 .NET Framework 公共语言运行时上运行的代码的不同之处在于 (CLR) ，以及在 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 中集成的 CLR 上运行的代码。There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005. 这可能会导致为 .NET Framework CLR 开发的代码在 SQL Server 集成 CLR 上使用时的操作方式有所不同。This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR. 当你在 使用 方法或构造函数) 时，当你具有基于 URL 的证据时，其中一种差异会影响类 ( 。One of these differences affects the class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the method or the constructor). SQL Server 集成 CLR 的策略解析机制不使用 或 信息。The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the or information. 相反，它会根据加载程序集时服务器添加的 GUID 来授予权限。Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded. 在 SQL Server 集成 CLR 中使用时，请使用指定的直接提供任何所需的证据 。When you use the in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified . ## Examples 此示例使用 构造函数创建一个 仅允许访问本地 intranet 站点的对象。This example uses the constructor to create an object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 应用程序可以 通过实现一个 限制读取的字节数的来缓解对方法的内存拒绝服务威胁。Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the method by implementing an that limits the number of bytes read. 这有助于防止恶意代码尝试将无限字节流传递到方法的情况 。This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the method.

exception.span: 既不是 也不是 类型。

span.span: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
is .

exception.span: 存在运行时错误（例如中断的服务器连接）。

span.span: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
